body_text:
I am using virtualenv
No didn’t. But it should upgrade smoothly without uninstall and then install.

- Best Regards,
Neha Dave


From: jubjamie <notifications@github.com>
Reply-To: tensorflow/tensorflow <reply@reply.github.com>
Date: Tuesday, 21 March 2017 at 9:13 PM
To: tensorflow/tensorflow <tensorflow@noreply.github.com>
Cc: "Dave, Neha" <Neha.Dave@fmr.com>, Author <author@noreply.github.com>
Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] TensorFlow upgrade to 1.0.1 (#8586)


What env manager are you using?
Did you uninstall 1.0.0 before upgrading to 1.0.1? If it's causing concern I would try uninstalling and reinstalling. It shouldn't do any harm.

—

I am using virtualenv
No didn’t. But it should upgrade smoothly without uninstall and then install.

- Best Regards,
Neha Dave
